format._instruction: If file instances and bundles within the repository are organized and formatted according to a formal data structure use the appropriate contentType. Leave blank otherwise.
format.description: Method of digitally organizing and structuring data or information.
format.title: format

hash._instruction: Add the hash that was generated for this file repository.
hash.description: Term used for the process of converting any data into a single value. Often also directly refers to the resulting single value.
hash.title: hash

hostedBy._instruction: Add the host of this file repository.
hostedBy.description: Reference to an organization that provides facilities and services for something.
hostedBy.title: hostedBy

IRI._instruction: Enter the internationalized resource identifier (IRI) of this file repository.
IRI.description: Stands for Internationalized Resource Identifier which is an internet protocol standard that builds on the URI protocol, extending the set of permitted characters to include Unicode/ISO 10646.
IRI.title: IRI

name._instruction: Enter the name of this file repository.
name.description: Word or phrase that constitutes the distinctive designation of a being or thing.
name.title: name

repositoryType._instruction: Add the type of this file repository.
repositoryType.title: repositoryType

storageSize._instruction: Enter the storage size this file repository allocates.
storageSize.description: Quantitative value defining how much disk space is used by an object on a computer system.
storageSize.title: storageSize

description: Structured information on a file repository.
